title: About Me
content_left:
Hello World and welcome to my blog, my Name is Cat Hamster, I know thats a funny name, and because I always got bullied for that in school, I swore myself to create something cool and rise above it all.

And here we are.

I will Share some Personal stuff here as well as some poetry, some of my photoart and a lot more.

If you Like my Page don't be shy and let me know.
